page.title: 08A LOCAL SHOP
page.content: THE POST OFFICE IS ON THE GRID REFERENCE{044450132.}THE POST OFFICE HAS ABOUT 150 CUSTOMERS EACH DAY.THE POST MISTRESS' HUSBAND WORKS BEHIND THE COUNTER WHICH SELLS{T.V. LICENSES} AND GIVES PENSIONS AND CAN START CHILDRENS ACCOUNTS. THE POST MISTRESS WORKS BEHIND THE SWEETS COUNTER.I WAS AMAZED BY SOME OF THE ANSWERS WE GOT. THE POST MISTRESS WAS VERY NICE AND TRIED TO ANSWER ALL THE QUESTIONS.THEY DO NOT HAVE ANY PETS BUT THEY DO HAVE TWO BOYS.WE TOOK OUR BLACK CLIP BOARDS TO WRITE DOWN THE ANSWERS.THE POST MISTRESS AND POST MASTER HAVE BEEN WORKING IN THE POST OFFICE FOR ABOUT TEN YEARS.THEY LIKE LITTLETON A LOT BECAUSE IT IS SMALL AND QUIET.
